channel.title: No Text Displays In The Option Menu
channel.description:
The game plays fine for me but when I try to view/change options, the options window/dialogue box is blank. I see radio buttons and drop-down menus but no text at all.
I'm running on:
Windows 7 x64 AMD Phenom II X4 945 Processor 6 GB RAM
Any ideas on how to get the text to appear?

item.title: No Text Displays In The Option Menu
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Could you please post a screenshot illustrating the problem then and provide details on the videocard you have and its driver version?

Read full topic
item.source: No Text Displays In The Option Menu

item.title: No Text Displays In The Option Menu
item.dc:creator: thecgmguy
item.description:
lexa2:

Make sure you have BM installed to the folder named BMS, i.e. in /steamapps/sourcemods/BMS.

There’s a sticky post about this.

It is. Or at least, I think it is. That directory path exists and there are a lot of files/sub-directories under there (e.g. bin, cfg, expressions, detail.vbsp, detail_xen.vbsp, etc).

Read full topic
item.source: No Text Displays In The Option Menu
